gen:link.msg:message: The date reported for `DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearStartDate` MUST be earlier than the date reported for `DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearEndDate`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearStartDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearStartDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Consideration` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU4_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU4_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearEndDate` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU8_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU8_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearStartDate` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU7_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU7_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ExistenceOfAnEmploymentRelationship` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU6_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU6_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IndividualMaximumRemuneration` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU10_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU10_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PositionOrPositions` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReasonsForExceedingMaximumAmountOfRemuneration` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration` is greater than 0. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU1_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU1_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReceivableUnduePaymentsExplanation` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `UnduePayments` is greater than 0. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU2_UnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU2_UnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RemunerationUnduePayments` MUST be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_RemunerationUnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_RemunerationUnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfRemunerationUnduePaymentsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfRemunerationUnduePaymentsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfRemunerationUnduePaymentsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfRemunerationUnduePaymentsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RemunerationUnduePayments` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU11_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU11_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Remuneration` MUST be equal to + `RemunerationUnduePayments` - `UnduePayments`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables3_Remuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables3_Remuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables3_RemunerationUnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables3_RemunerationUnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables3_UnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST102Variables3_UnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Remuneration` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU12_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU12_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE` MUST be greater than or equal to 0.025. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1NumericGEConstant1_ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1NumericGEConstant1_ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE` MUST be less than or equal to 1. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1NumericLEConstant1_ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1NumericLEConstant1_ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU3_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsFrom13MonthSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU3_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
